characters.name: Fuutarou Uesugi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 178 cm  (5'10'')

Fuutarou is the main protagonist of the 5-toubun no Hanayome series.

He is a student of the Asahiyama High School. He lives with his father, Isanari Uesugi, and younger sister, Raiha Uesugi, in a small apartment. He is a serious and hardworking high school student and a prodigy at the top of his grade. Because of his family's perpetual poverty, he takes up the offer to tutor the Nakano quintuplets.

Fuutarou is noted to have a big ego and high confidence. He is straightforward, tactless, and rude; but is actually capable of holding back his emotions. Despite that, Fuutarou could momentarily lose his composure when agitated and faced with unfavorable circumstances. He also initially did not like getting involved with other people's problems, finding them to be troublesome. Despite his tactlessness and crudeness, he is knowledgeable enough in knowing what to say in specific situations when thrown at him; rarely giving up when trying to achieve a specific objective.

Despite his egotistical nature, Fuutarou is very hardworking and has a very high amount of patience; especially when getting the attention of the quintuplets and tutoring them despite various amounts of failures and setbacks. He later on shows a sense of duty strong enough to help the quintuplets in their studies despite them not paying him immediately, even though the money that came with tutoring was the initial reason he accepted the job. He also begins valuing their relationship to the point where he would do things outside of their tutor-student relationship which would later on bloom into a bond where they mutually support each other with little question.

characters.name: Ichika Nakano
characters.description:
__Height__: 159 cm (5'2")

First sister of the Nakano Quintuplets. Despite the negligible age difference among them, she took the role of the eldest sister properly. She is also trusted enough to act as their confidant and leader. Ichika aspires to become an actress. She likes to tease [Fuutarou](https://anilist.co/character/128063).

(一) means one.
(花) means flower, blossom.

characters.name: Nino Nakano
characters.description:
**Height:** 159 cm (5'2")

Second sister of the Nakano quintuplets. She usually acts as the mother of the family, she cooks for them and takes care of their medical needs. Among the five sisters, she is the one who has the highest hostility towards [Fuutarou](https://anilist.co/character/128063) and often rebels against him.

Nino has a sharp tongue and talks bluntly when confronting the others, even if the other party is her sister. She has an outgoing attitude and is socially aware, resulting in her having many friends. She is a scheming person and doesn't hesitate to use underhanded methods to achieve her goals.

(二) means two.
(乃) means from.

characters.name: Miku Nakano
characters.description:
__Height:__ 159 cm (5'2")

Third sister of the Nakano Quintuplets. She is a silent and reserved girl. Miku tends to have a pessimistic attitude and little confidence regarding herself. Due to [Fuutarou](https://anilist.co/character/128063)'s influence, she's the first among the sisters who open up to him.

Miku likes Japanese History (especially Generals from Sengoku Period) and greatly influenced by their philosophies, to the point of affecting her real-life behavior.

(三) means three.
(玖) means black jewel.

characters.name: Yotsuba Nakano
characters.description:
**Height:** 159 cm (5'2")

She is the fourth sister of the Nakano Quintuplets, and one of the main characters of the Quintessential Quintuplets series. Having a cheerful and energetic personality, she has a strong tendency of helping people out. Yotsuba is an active and easygoing girl. She is a type of person who can't say no to people who need help. She is also very physically fit, and is capable of tasks that her sisters can not do. She has excellent endurance and is great at sports. She's the only sister with excellent eyesight. She has a good sense of smell and a green thumb. Though she's great at physical activities, she has the lowest score out of all of her sisters.

Yotsuba is the only sister who accepts [Fuutarou](https://anilist.co/character/128063) since the beginning and wholeheartedly supports him in everything. 

(四) means four.
(葉) means leaf.

characters.name: Itsuki Nakano
characters.description:
**Height:** 159 cm (5'2")

Fifth sister of the Nakano Quintuplets. Itsuki is a serious and earnest girl. Her speech is formal and polite. She is also someone who can't be honest with herself and having difficulty to be more straightforward.

Among the sisters, Itsuki is the most familiar with [Uesugi](https://anilist.co/character/128063)'s family members and circumstances.

(五) means five.
(月) means moon.

Note: Based on the character file in volume 14, Itsuki’s actual birthday is on May 6th as she was born at midnight. She celebrates her birthday on May 5th and prevents others from looking into it too deeply.

characters.name: Raiha Uesugi
characters.description: Fuutarou's cheerful younger sister. Being the only female and the most family-conscious she is effectively the head of the small household. Her cute facial expressions will often sway others' hearts. Appreciating the hard work Fuutarou does for their family, she sometimes delays the supper until his late return home so she can prepare his favourite meal.

characters.name: Isanari Uesugi
characters.description: Father of [Fuutarou](https://anilist.co/character/128063/Fuutarou-Uesugi) and [Raiha](https://anilist.co/character/130111/Raiha-Uesugi).

characters.name: Maruo Nakano
characters.description: Stepfather of the Nakano Quintuplets after their mother remarried, several years before the series begins. He runs a large hospital and is also a doctor.

characters.name: Takebayashi
characters.description: Fuutarou's childhood friend.

characters.name: Shimoda
characters.description: She is a former student of Rena Nakano (the Nakano Quintuplets' mother) during her 2nd year of senior high school and she is currently a cram school lecturer. She is first seen encountering Itsuki Nakano while visiting the Nakano Family Grave. ~!Shimoda exchange contact address with Itsuki and promise to keep in touch. Later, Itsuki is seen working part-time job with Shimoda. !~

characters.name: Itsutsuko no Sofu
characters.description:
He is the maternal grandfather of the Nakano quintuplets and the father of Rena Nakano. He is the manager of the Toraiwa Hot Springs inn.
~!He later fell ill and passed away about three years after the main story and therefore could not attend his granddaughter's wedding with Fuutarou Uesugi.!~

characters.name: Ebata
characters.description:
He is the secretary of [Maruo Nakano](https://anilist.co/character/135383) and occasionally driver of the Nakano quintuplets. Ebata is said to have a professional history as a school teacher. He cares deeply for the quintuplets.

~!Ebata took on the pseudonym of Atabe Maruo, the quintuplets' fictitious tutor, at their favor in an attempt at making [Fuutarou Uesugi](https://anilist.co/character/128063) their tutor again. Before this, Maruo assigned Ebata as the quintuplets' tutor after Fuutarou resigned. In the end he helps the plan of the quintuplets in bringing Fuutarou back as their tutor.!~

characters.name: Yuusuke Takeda
characters.description:
He is a student of Class 3-1. He is introduced as the antithesis of Fuutarou Uesugi in terms of appearance, personality and popularity. Yuusuke is envious of Fuutarou because he is always academically the best student in his grade, leaving Yuusuke a pitiful second place. Yuusuke considers Fuutarou his rival, much to Fuutarou's unawareness.
~!Because of his pride, he desired to score higher than Fuutarou in a fair competition, throwing out the test answers his father gave him. He loses to Fuutarou in the mock exam, with he got seventh place and Fuutarou third. He later becomes Fuutarou friend.!~

characters.name: Eba
characters.description: She is a 3rd-year high school student and captain of the track team. Eba praises Yotsuba for her athletic talent, she urges for Yotsuba to join the track team by exploiting the latter's easy-going character, despite Yotsuba's failed plea of refusal.

characters.name: Maeda
characters.description:
Student of the Asahiyama High School.
Before the school camping trip, Maeda asked Ichika Nakano to see him in a class where he would ask her to dance with him at the bonfire dance.    ~!This came out as a failure. Later he went with another girl at the bonfire dance. Five years later, the pair showed up at Fuutarou's wedding, already married and she is pregnant.!~

characters.name: Hongo
characters.description: She is the captain of the Basketball Club. Yotsuba would constantly assist the the Club, Due to her inability to say no. Hongo would even ask her if she wanted to join the club, to which Yotsuba refuses.

characters.name: Oda
alt_names: Hige no Ojisan (ヒゲのおじさん)
characters.description: Oda is a film producer of the Oda Talent Productions and Ichika Nakano's manager. He is the single father of Kiku.

characters.name: Fukkatsu no Tenchou
characters.description: The manager of the pastry shop Revival, His shop rivals the bakery shop Komugiya.

characters.name: Komugiya no Tenchou
characters.description: The manager of the bakery shop Komugiya, Her shop rivals the pastry shop Revival.

characters.name: Rena Nakano
characters.description:
She is the biological mother of the Nakano Quintuplets who worked as a teacher. She was a teacher at a high school where she was well-loved and respected by her students. [Shimoda](https://anilist.co/character/157106) was once her student. Rena is known to be a very serious, unsociable, strict, and stern woman, especially when it comes to teaching her students as she would often punish her students with iron-fist sanctions.
~!Rena was a single mother who raised five children. Before her remarriage with [Maruo Nakano](https://anilist.co/character/135383), she and the quintuplets were living in poverty like the Uesugi Family, where it is implied that the biological father of the quintuplets ([Mudou](https://anilist.co/character/157196)) abandoned her and the children. She passed away five years prior to the start of the story on August 14 from an unknown terminal illness and her death was a shock to the quintuplets!~

characters.name: Jinnosuke Mudou
characters.description:
He is a guest instructor in the test prep class that [Itsuki Nakano](https://anilist.co/character/126375) have attended.
~!He was the former teacher and ex-husband of [Rena Nakano](https://anilist.co/character/157195), thus being the biological father of the Nakano quintuplets. He holds some animosity towards [Maruo Nakano](https://anilist.co/character/135383) because of allowing his daughters to follow the same misguided path as did his late wife.!~

characters.name: Kiku
characters.description: Kiku is the only daughter of [Oda](https://anilist.co/character/157161), [Ichika Nakano](https://anilist.co/character/126371)'s director. Being raised by a single father and conscious of her parents' divorce, Kiku develops an arrogant personality, In truth, Kiku feels lonely for not having a mother figure.

characters.name: Sanada
characters.description: He is a boy who appeared in Fuutarou Uesugi's Kyoto trip flashback. Similar to Fuutarou, he was focused on studying, even doing maths during a field trip. He and Takebayashi were childhood friends. Both being class representatives, their classmates perceived the duo to be perfect for each other.

characters.name: Football no Coach
alt_names: フットボールのコーチ
characters.description: He is a football coach that appeared five years ago in the Nakano quintuplets' flashback. He seems to have known a lot about the quintuplets and usually asks them to help him with football practices. He had a crush on the quintuplets' mother, [Rena Nakano](https://anilist.co/character/157195).

characters.name: Matsui
characters.description: A student at the Asahiyama High School. She danced with [Maeda](https://anilist.co/character/157144/Maeda) at the bonfire during the school field trip.

characters.name: Yumi
characters.description: Yumi is a member of the tennis club and a classmate of the Quints and Fuutarou.

characters.name: Takeda
characters.description: He is the board chairman of the senior high school Fuutarou Uesugi is attending and Yuusuke Takeda's father.

characters.name: Kurobara no Gakkou Kaichou
characters.description: He is the board chairman of the Nakano Quintuplets's middle school.

characters.name: Tsubaki
characters.description: Tsubaki is a student of Asahiyama High School's Class 3-1. She is a member of the Broadcasting Club.

characters.name: Yamada
characters.description: She is a student of the Asahiyama High School and friend of [Nino Nakano](https://anilist.co/character/126372/).

characters.name: Yamauchi
characters.description: He is a male student at the Asahiyama High School and a classmate of [Nino Nakano](https://anilist.co/character/126372/) during her second year.
